attributes.review: I expected this app to be great, but it was super glitchy and drained my battery. my phone was having all these problems after I downloaded it. for example, the app would crash after 30 seconds and it would mess with my brightness. also the events page would never load and would just keep refreshing. it also was tracking my location without permission which was sketchy. i really wanted to like this app but was disappointed. please remove it and stick to the website
